Reviews.Title: Really great screen, at a price
Reviews.Author: Andzsin
Reviews.Content: Best screen I've seen so far in a handheld device, it even outperforms the Iphone 4S' Retina Display. Beautiful pictures, videos, animations. Fantastic colours.But as always, there is a price. Battery life. I wouldn't say it sucks but every time I take a look at the battery usage graph (great btw.), screen is ALWAYS above 50-60%! I suppose this tells a lot. A phone of this caliber was not meant to lay low in pockets. It's not its purpose.What else could I say? Everything else works great for me. I often read bitching comments about the USB port cover. Come on guys.... What's your problem, really? It's not great, but it's just fine. Unremovable battery? Who cares?

Reviews.Title: Awasome phone
Reviews.Author: Joseluis Arce
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, is fast (the fastest I tried, even compared to SG S2), colorfull screen and an elitist design. The only issue is related to only MTP connection available until now (no MSC): I come from a SE X10 and I was able to connect this phone to my car audio system throughout USB port and control my music via steering controls; with the SX-S this is impossible and I have to connect via 3,5mm jack.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for almost a month and I am very happy with it!Although it depends on the usage, I found it has decent battery life.One small issue I am facing last couple of days is its loosing wifi connection at times...

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but.............
Reviews.Author: Yab2011
Reviews.Content: I bought four phones for me and my family. It has a very nice shape and screen and everybody like it. However, the battery is the main problem of this phone. It will not last more than 3 hours if you use it continuously or maximum four hours of calling. Also, it does not support the 3G or 4G network from T-Mobile service if you are planning to use it with T-Mobile network. But with Wi Fi its very fast.
